heroBanner.headingTxt: United to live well with cystinosis
heroBanner.bannerContent: A community can help you find your way on your cystinosis journey. Whether you're a patient, caregiver, sibling, or spouse, unity makes choices—big and small—less complicated.

links.linkTxt: Get tips to help with everyday living

imageTile.headingTxt: Finding a cystinosis treatment that's right for you
imageTile.imageDescription: We give you information to help you understand your treatment options so you can have a meaningful discussion with your doctor.

featuredContentCollage.headingTxt: We're Cystinosis United, and we're glad you're here
featuredContentCollage.collageContent: Cystinosis United is a part of a growing community of people—like you—who want to live their best lives with this rare disease. By uniting to share experiences and tips, people with cystinosis grow stronger, more confident, and better prepared to face the unique challenges of this condition.

imageTile.imageDescription: Get information about cystinosis that's easy to understand from reliable sources.

imageTile.headingTxt: Tips for advocating for yourself or your child
imageTile.imageDescription: Learn how to speak up and be heard.
One of the most important things you can do is check and keep track of your cystine levels.
Advice for dealing with social issues your child may face.

cta.headingTxt: Cystinosis United: where people living with cystinosis come together
cta.ctaContent: Join our community, and we'll send information about living with cystinosis to your inbox.
